entry.title: The Gaza Strip: What To Know, Maps and History
entry.content: Israel told 1.1 million civilians who live in northern Gaza to evacuate to the southern part of the strip.

entry.title: U.N. Urges Israel to Rescind Gaza Evacuation Order
entry.content: Israel is asking more than one million civilians to leave the enclave’s north to avoid getting caught up in its offensive against militant group Hamas.

entry.title: Ukraine, Partners Fight to Avoid Stalemate as Headwinds Grow
entry.content: Concerns about the slow pace of Ukraine’s advances this year have been accentuated by doubts over the durability of Western aid.

entry.title: These Machines Save the Sickest Patients. When to Turn Them Off Is Tricky.
entry.content: Patients have spent 600 days on machines some people come to rely on.
